TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RouteTable extends System.Object

summary.span: 存储应用程序的 URL 路由。

span.span: Stores the URL routes for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由是在用于处理请求，并可以使用动态构造 Url 的 URL 模式。Routes are URL patterns that are used for processing requests and that can be used to construct URLs dynamically. 属性是`static`属性 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，其中包含应用程序，用于指定如何将 URL 请求匹配到将处理该请求的类的所有路由。The property is a `static` property (`Shared` in Visual Basic) that contains all the routes in an application that are used to specify how a URL request is matched to a class that handles the request. 若要指定一个路由，你添加到路由定义属性。To specify a route, you add the route definition to the property. 通常，你将添加到路由属性的事件处理程序从`Application_Start`Global.asax 文件中的事件。Typically, you add routes to the property from an event handler for the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file. 应用程序时 ASP.NET 应用程序处理请求时，循环访问集合中的路由属性来查找符合格式的 URL 请求的路由。When an ASP.NET application handles a request, the application iterates through the collection of routes in the property to find the route that matches the format of the URL request. 你将添加到的路由的顺序属性很重要，因为应用程序使用查找集合中的第一个路由，与匹配 URL。The order of the routes that you add to the property is significant, because the application uses the first route that it finds in the collection that matches the URL. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将添加对象传递给属性。The following example shows how to add a object to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Routes As RouteCollection
public: static property System::Web::Routing::RouteCollection ^ Routes { System::Web::Routing::RouteCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取从 类派生的对象的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that derive from the class.

value.span: 包含集合中所有路由的对象。

span.span: An object that contains all the routes in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路由是在用于处理请求，并可以使用动态构造 Url 的 URL 模式。Routes are URL patterns that are used for processing requests and that can be used to construct URLs dynamically. 属性是`static`属性 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，它表示用于指定如何将 URL 请求匹配到将处理该请求的类的所有对象。The property is a `static` property (`Shared` in Visual Basic) that represents all the objects that are used to specify how a URL request is matched to a class that handles the request. 若要指定一个路由，你添加到路由定义属性。To specify a route, you add the route definition to the property. 通常，你将添加到路由属性的事件处理程序从`Application_Start`Global.asax 文件中的事件。Typically, you add routes to the property from an event handler for the `Application_Start` event in the Global.asax file. 应用程序时 ASP.NET 应用程序处理请求时，循环访问集合中的路由属性来查找符合格式的 URL 请求的路由。When an ASP.NET application handles a request, the application iterates through the collection of routes in the property to find the route that matches the format of the URL request. 你将添加到的路由的顺序属性很重要，因为应用程序集合中使用的第一个路由，与匹配 URL。The order of the routes that you add to the property is significant, because the application uses the first route in the collection that matches the URL. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将添加对象传递给属性。The following example shows how to add a object to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.RouteTable.Routes/vb/Global.asax#1)]
